title: returned non-zero exit status 1.
body:
## Component Versions

Please at least fill in the release version and GUI or CLI version.
[Video2X 4.8.1 Full](https://github.com/k4yt3x/video2x/releases/tag/4.8.1)
```
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| NVIDIA-SMI 461.09       Driver Version: 461.09       CUDA Version: 11.2     |
|-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+
| GPU  Name            TCC/WDDM | Bus-Id        Disp.A | Volatile Uncorr. ECC |
| Fan  Temp  Perf  Pwr:Usage/Cap|         Memory-Usage | GPU-Util  Compute M. |
|                               |                      |               MIG M. |
|===============================+======================+======================|
|   0  GeForce GTX 650 Ti WDDM  | 00000000:01:00.0 N/A |                  N/A |
| 30%   32C    P8    N/A /  N/A |    643MiB /  1024MiB |     N/A      Default |
|                               |                      |                  N/A |
+-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+

+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Processes:                                                                  |
|  GPU   GI   CI        PID   Type   Process name                  GPU Memory |
|        ID   ID                                                   Usage      |
|=============================================================================|
|  No running processes found                                                 |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
```

## Symptom
Throw an upscale run error
